name: zCrusher
description:
ZCrush is a mini game created with Construct 2 in 3 hours.

Use arrow key for move, mouse for aim/shoot and the space bar for respawn.

Now avaible on Newgrounds.com: http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/679317

You can play my latest game (and canceled), here :

http://kodle.itch.io/wiljump
